title: Continuous Planning
content: Bridge the gap between strategic goals and the day to day management of work. With increased visibility and alignment, you have the insights to support an outcome-driven approach to software development.

title: Continuous Testing
content: Scale your automated tests as part of the software delivery pipeline and obtain immediate feedback on the business risks at every commit, every step or gate and through to production.

title: Continuous Integration
content: Plan and control application release processes across your enterprise, from definition to deployment.

title: Continuous Improvement
content: Observe trends, identify bottlenecks, find correlations, and detect anomalies in your development cycle, and implement changes that have the desired impact.

title: Continuous Delivery
content: Seamlessly enable deployment pipeline automation reducing cycle times and providing rapid feedback on deployments and release across all your environments.

title: Application and Process Modernization
content: MModernize trusted core systems and processes to deliver new business value.
